title: Will an Olympic Swim Coach Keep Visma-Lease a Bike at the Top of the Tour de France?
content:
Rumor that swim guru Jacco Verhaeren will succeed outgoing mastermind DS Merijn Zeeman points to growth of cross-sport expertise in pro cycling.

Read the full article at Will an Olympic Swim Coach Keep Visma-Lease a Bike at the Top of the Tour de France? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
